articles.caption: A look at mobile games industry 2023 prediction
articles.title: The Mobile Games Industry In the Year 2023  ‚Äî Deconstructor of Fun
articles.description:
After a decade of growth, the mobile games industry has declined for the 
first time ever. The impacts of the global recession, the end of lockdowns, 
and the collapse of performance marketing as we know it have a profound 
impact this year.
